field.title: UNDER-REPRESENTED GROUPS
field.content:
We also have private "opt-in" channels for under represented groups within our society. Respecting your privacy, these are not assigned to you as roles but rather as direct additions to the channel access allowlists.
**Please be respectful about these groups, and do not join randomly.**
:transgender_flag: #trans - A space for the trans* friends of CompSoc :heart: #poc - A space for people of colour :rainbow_flag: #lgbtqia+ - A space with queer vibes :wheelchair: #disability - A space for those with disabilities or accessibility needs of all kinds :woman: #women - A space for women :hindu_temple: #hinduism - A hindu space :church: #christianity - A christian space
Not feeling represented? Message a Committee member or Discord Staff and we'll see what we can do for you.
